Title: TYPO3 Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in typolinks
Description: All link fields within the TYPO3 installation are vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting as authorized editors can insert javascript commands by using the url scheme `javascript:`.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.16, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.6.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.16 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.6.1
